column1: Little Goat Diner////I also got a cinnamon bun and some smoked fries. The bun is certainly better made but
column3: not actually more satisfying than what you could find at Cinnabon. The smoked fries were an incredibly disappointing small cupful of average fries that barely had any smoke flavor -- hardly worth 3 dollars in my opinion
column4: much less the $6 they actually charged.
